subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Trades (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The real interest at the N.H.L. draft is in the general managers who are poised to make trades, including the Rangers’ Glen Sather, who may again try to acquire Rick Nash.
snippet: The real interest at the N.H.L. draft is in the general managers who are poised to make trades, including the Rangers’ Glen Sather, who may again try to acquire Rick Nash.
